titleStmt.title: Four Gospels, Book of Hours, Missal, Prayers, Sinodos

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msItem.title: Anaphora of Our Lord Jesus Christ
Anaphora of Our Lady by St. Cyriacus of Behnesa
ሰዓታት፡ ዘነግህ፡
msItem.incipit: ወአዘዙ፡ ሐዋርያት፡ በሲኖዶሶሙ፡ እንዘ፡ ይብሉ፡ ነግሀ፡ ይጼልዩ፡ ባቲ፡ ለሰሚአ፡ ተምሕርት፡ ወተዓተቦ፡ ፍጽመ፡ መስቀል፡ ኵሎሙ፡ ምእምናን፡ ወምእምናት፤ ተንሢኦሙ፡ ነግሀ፡ እንዘ፡ ኢይገብሩ፡ ወኢምንተኒ፡ መፍቅዶሙ፡ ይትኀፀቡ፡ እደዊሆሙ፡ ወይጸልዩ፡ ኀበ፡ እግዚአብሔር።
msItem.explicit: ስማዕ፡ እግዚኦ፡ ቃልየ፡ ወለቡ፡ ጽራሕየ፨ ተወከፈኒ፡ ጸሎትየ፡ ከመ፡ ዕጣን፡ በቅድሜከ፡ ዘይሰማዕ፡ ግበር፡ ሊተ፡ ምሕረትከ፡ በጽብሕ።

msItem.title: ሊጣን፡ ዘነግህ፡
msItem.incipit: ወካዕበ፡ ናስተበቍዕ፡ ዘኵሎ፡ ይእኅዝ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አቡሁ፡ ለእግዚእ፡ ወመድኀኒነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፨ እንዘ፡ ነአኵቶ፡ እስመ፡ ዓቀበነ፡ በኑኅ፡ ሌሊት፡ ወአብጽኀነ፡ እምጽልመት፡ ውስተ፡ ብርሃን፡ እሙስና፡ ውስተ፡ ዘኢይማሥን፡ እም፡ ኢይእምሮ፡ ውስተ፡ አእምሮ፡ አማን፨
msItem.explicit: ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ ዳግሚት፡ ሰማይ፡ ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ ሙጻአ፡ ጸሓይ፨ ሰላም፡ ለከ፡ ዓንቀጸ፡ መድኀኒት፤ ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ ሙዳየ፡ ዕፍረት፤ ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ እመ፡ እግዚአብሔር፤ ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ ዘምስለ፡ ሰጊድ፡ ንኤምሐኪ፡ ለባርኮተነ፡ ስፍሒ፡ እዴኪ፨

msItem.title: Prayer for the third hour
msItem.incipit:
በ፫፡ ሰዓት፡ መዝሙር፡ በ፮፨ ይቤ፡ እግዚእ፡ ሊቀ፡ ከህናት፡ ዘቦአ፡ ውሣጤ፡ መንጦላዕት፡ ጸሎት፡ በ፫፡ ሰዓት፡ በ፭፨ መኑ፡ ደመሮ፡ ለጸልመት፡
ምስለ፡ ብርሃን፡ ወለጽድቅ፡ ምስለ፡ ኀጢአት፨
msItem.explicit: ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ ሐመረ፡ ብዕልነ፨ ሰ፨ መዝገበ፡ ወርቅነ፡ ሰ፨ አስከሬነ፡ ሰርጕነ፡ ሰ፨ ቀፀላ፡ ርእስነ፡ ሰ፨ ታቦተ፡ ኅግነ፡ ሰ፨ ድንግለ፡ እስራኤል፡ ጠባብ፡ ሰ፨ ዘምስለ፡ ሰጊድ፡ ንኤምሐኪ፡ ለባርኮተነ፡ ስፍሒ፡ እዴኪ፨

msItem.title: Prayer for the sixth hour
msItem.incipit: ጸሎት፡ በ፮፡ ሰዓት፡ በ፪፨ ከመ፡ ዝ፡ ይቤ፡ ጰውሎስ፡ ለብሔረ፡ ሮሜ፡ በምንትኑ፡ እንከ፡ አኀውየ፡ ጸሎትነ፡ ለእመ፡ ኢናአምር፡ ተስፋነ፨ ወባሕቱ፡ መንፈስ። ቅዱስ፡ ይትዋቅሥ፡ በእንቲአነ፡ በጸሎት፡ ዘኢይትአመር፨
msItem.explicit:
ሰላም፡ ለከ፡ አትሮንሰ፡ መለኮት፡ ሰላም፡ ለከ፨ መንበረ፡ ስብሐት፡
ሰለም፡ ለከ፨ ደብተራ፡ ብርሃን፡ ስፍሐት፡ ሰላም፡ ለከ፨ ንግሥተ፡ ይሁዳ፡ ሰላም፡ ለከ፨
ጸሐየ፡ መርመዳ፡ ሰላም፡ ለከ፨ ድንግልናዊት፡ እም፡ ሰላም፡ ለኪ፨ ዘምስለ፡ ሰጊድ፡ ንኤምኀኪ፡ ለባርኮተነ፡ ስፍሒ፡ እዴኪ፨

msItem.title: Prayer for the ninth hour
msItem.incipit:
ጸሎት፡ በ፱ ሰዓት፡ በ፪፨ መዝሙር፡ ሃሌ፡ ሉያ፡ ሃሌ፡ ሉያ፡ ይቤሎ፡ ሐዋርያት፡ በዲድስቅልያ፡ ገስጾሙኬ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጰስ፡ ለሕዝብከ፡ ወአዝዞሙ፡ ይምጽኡ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፨ መዓልተ፡ ወሌሊተ፡ ወግሞራ፡
ኢይርሐቁ፡ እምኔሁ፡
msItem.explicit:
በከመ፡ ተሠጠ፡ መንጦላዕተ፡ ቤተ፡ መቅድስ፡ ጊዜ፡ ተሱዓት፡ አመ፡ ፀአተ፡ ነፍስከ፨ ሥጥጥ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ዕዳነ፡ በሕማመ፡ ሞትከ፤
ወጽሐፍ፡ አስማቲነ፡ ውስተ፡ ጕንደ፡ መስቀልከ፡ በቀለመ፡ ደምለ፨ ከመ፡ አንተ፡ በአብ፡ ወአብ፡ ብከ፨ ረስየኒ፡ ሱቱፋነ፡ ምስለ፡ አርዳኢከ፨ ወዝራእ፡ ውስተ፡ ልብነ፡ ወንጌለ፡ ፀጋከ፡ ጊዜ፡ ምሴት፡ ጸግወነ፡ ሰላምከ፤ እግዚኦ፡ መሐረነ፡ ክርስቶስ፨ ፲፪፡ ጊዜ፡ ወአቡነ፡ ዘበሰማያት፨ =፨

msItem.title: ጸሎተ፡ ፲፪ሰዓት፡ በጊዜ፡ ሰርክ፡
msItem.incipit: በ፭። ህየነ፡ እዴከ፡ ትመርሀኒ፡ ወታነብረኒ፡ የማነከ። አይቴኑ፡ አኀውር፡ እመንፈስከ፡ ወአይቴኑ፡ እጐይይ፡ እምቅድመ፡ ገፅከ፡ ብጹዕ፡ ዘኀረይኮ፡ ወዘተወከፍኮ፡ ወዘአሕደርኮ፡ ውስተ፡ አዕፃዲከ፨
msItem.explicit: ሰላም፡ ለኪ። ሐመረ፡ አድኅኖ፡ ዘጽድቅ፡ ሰለም፡ ለኪ። አስከሬነ፡ ወርቅ፡ ሰላም፡ ለኪ። ኮለ፡ ኢያሪኮ፡ ዘሐይቅ፡ ሰላም፡ ለኪ። ኖኅተ፡ ምሥራቅ፡ ሰላም፡ ለኪ። ሀገሪተ፡ ዕንቍ፡ ሰላም፡ ለኪ። ሐዳስ፡ ንድቅ፡ መደበለ፡ ማሕበር፡ ጽፉቅ፡ ሰለም፡ ለኪ። ዘምስለ፡ ሰጊድ፡ ንኤምኀኪ፡ ሱላሜ፡ እንተ፡ ሰርክ፡ ንትወፈይ፡ ሕዝብኪ፨

msItem.title: ጸሎተ፡ ፫ሰዓት፡ ሌሊት፡ በጊዜ፡ ንዋም፡
msItem.incipit: ሃሌ፡ ሉያ፡ ሃሌ፡ ሉያ፡ መኑ፡ ይትዔረዮ፡ ለእግዚአብሔር፡ በደመናት። ወመኑ፡ ይመስሎ፡ እምደቂቀ፡ አማልክት፡ መኑ፡ ሥሉጥ፡ በሩጸተ፡ ነፋሳት፡ ወበነኰርኳረ፡ መባርቀት፡
msItem.explicit: ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ መዝገበ፡ ስርናይ፤ ሰ፡ እመ፡ አዶናይ፨ ሰ፡ ዕንቆ፡ ባሕርይ፨ ሰ፡ ዓጸደ፡ ተክህኖ፨ ሰ፡ ዓንቀጸ፡ አድኅኖ፨ ሰ፡ ወለተ፡ ብርሃን፨ ሰ፡ ዘምስለ፡ ሰጊድ፡ ንኤመኃኪ፡ ለበርኮትነ፡ ስፍሕ፡ እዴኪ፨

msItem.title: ጸሎት፡ ዘመንፈቄ፡ ሌሊት፡
msItem.incipit:
ጸሎተ፡ ዘመንፈቀ፡ ሌሊት፤ ሃሌ፡ ሉያ፡ በስመ፡ አብ፡
ሰዳዴሆሙ፡ ለአጋንንት፡ ስድዶሙ፡ እግዚኦ፡ ለአጋንንት፡ እምየማንነ፡ ወእምፀጋምነ፤
msItem.note: On the office contains the following invocations (cp. ): St Stephen, St Cyriacus, Yāred, the Holy Church, the archangel Michael, the archangel Gabriel, the Four Beasts, the Twenty-Four Elders, the prophets, the apostles, the righteous, the martyrs and Our Lady Mary. The office also contains the following prayers (): for the sick, for the pilgrims, for the rain, 7:36-50, prayers to Our Lady Mary, for the fruits of the earth, for the water of the rivers, for the king, excerpts from an unidentified Psalm, 25:31-46, prayers for the sleepers, for the offerers, for the catechumens, for the peace, hymns to Our Lady Mary, 19:25-27, , a hymn to Mary erroneously entitled ፩ተአምሪሃ፡ ለእግዚአትነ፡ ቅድስት፡ ድንግል፡ በክልኤ፨ ማርያም፡, 11:5-13.

msItem.title: Hymns in honour of Our Lady Mary

msItem.incipit: ሰላም፡ ሰለም፡ አመደ፡ ህርይት፡ ዘኢትጽንን፡ ሰ። ሐመረ፡ ቅዱሳን፡ ማርያም፡ ሰ። በሰጊድ፡ ንብለኪ፡ ንኤምሐኪ፡ ሀመረ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ማርያም፡
msItem.explicit: ሰ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ። ለዝክርክሙ፡ ሕይወት። ሶበ፡ ከናፍርየ፡ እከስት፤ ስመ፡ ዚአክሙ፡ በኵሉ፡ ሰዓት። ይሰማዕ፡ እምአፉየ፡ ወይደንግጽ፡ ሞት፨

msItem.incipit: ተፈሥሒ፡ ማርያም፡ ድንግልተ፡ ሥጋ፡ ወህሊና፡ ተፈሥሒ፡ ማርያም፡ ወለተ፡ ኢያቄም፡ ውሐና፨ ጳጦስ፡ አንቲ፡ ዘአስተርአይከ፡ በደብረ፡ ሲና፨
msItem.explicit:
ምንተ፡ አዓስየኪ፡ እሴኪ፡ በእንተ፡ ኵሉ፡ ዘገበርኪ፡ ሊተ፡ ማርያም፡ ድንግል፡ ዘታፈቅሪ፡ ምኅረተ። ሶበሰ፡ ትትዓቀቢ፡ ዘዚአየ፡
ኀጢአት። እመ፡ ኢሐየወክ፡ አሓተ፡ ሰዓተ፨

msItem.incipit: ሰላም፡ ሰላም፡ አብል፡ ለኵሎን፡ መልክዕኪ። እመ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ እምየ፡ እግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፤ ዓዲ፡ ሰላም፡ ለክልኤ፡ ማኅተመ፡ ድንግልናኪ፡
msItem.explicit: ኦድንግል፡ ወለቱ፡ ለእስራኤል፡ ጽጌ፡ ከርስኪ፡ ልዑል፡ ኣማኑኤል፡ ጽጌ፡ ከርስኪ፡ ልዑል፡ ኣማኑኤል፨ ሰላም፡ ለድንግልና፡

msItem.title: Canons of the Apostles, 30 in number
Canons of the Apostles, few in number
Canons of Gangra, 20 in number
msItem.note: The text breaks off after Canon 18, on .

msItem.title: Canons of Clement, which he received in a letter from St Peter
Canons of Laodicea, canons 1-19
msItem.explicit: በእንተ፡ ጸሎት፡ ወይደልዎሙ፡ ለኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ሶበ፡ ነበረ፡

msItem.incipit:
ወካዕበ፡ ለእመ፡ ጽህቀ፡ ታእምር፡ ለረኪበ፡ አበቅጤ። አሐዱ፡ በእንተ፡ ዘይኀድጉ፡ እስመ፡ ቀዳሜሁ፡
ለዓመት፡ ኣልቦ፡ ኣጳቅቴ፤
msItem.explicit:
በከመ፡ ይቤ፡ ሰሎሞን፡ ወልድየ፡ ለእመ፡ ጠበብከ፡ ለርእስከ፡ ትጠብብ፡ ወለቢጽከ፡ ወይከውነከ፡ መዝገባ፡ ለምንግሥተ፡ ሰማያት፡ ወዲበ፡ ኰኵሕ፡ ቀዊመ፡ ታጽንዕ፡ ዘውእቱ፡
በእእምሮ፡ እንተ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ጴጥሮስ፡
msItem.note: On the epact and the way to determine the moveable feasts in the 19-year cycle.

msItem.incipit:
በስመ፡ አብ፡ ወውልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ጸሐፍነ፡ ተዝከረ፡ አወደ፡ ዓመታተ፡ እምቀዳሚ፡ ኵነኔ፡ እስከ፡ ዕዝራ፡ ፶፻፡
ዓመታት፡ ወእምዕዝራ፡ እስከ፡ ልደተ፡ መድኀኒነ፡ ፭፻፡ ፺፫፡ ዓመት፡ ወእምልደቱ፡ እስከ፡ ጥምቀቱ፡ ለመድኀኒነ፡ ፴፡ ዓመት፡ ወእምጥምቀቱ፡ እስከ፡ ቅትለቱ፡ ፬፡ ዓመት፡ ወእምትንሣኤሁ፡ እስከ፡ ዓመተ፡ ድዮቅልጠያኖስ፨ ፪፻፡ ፹፭፡ ዓመት፡ ወእምድዮቅልጠያኖስ፡ እስከ፡ ሠርዓተ፡
ቅዱስ፨ ፫፻፡ ፲፰፡ ፵፩፡ ዓመት፡ ወኮነ፡ ኵሉ፡ ድሙር፡ እምቀዳሚ፡ ኵነኔ፡ እስከ፡ ዓመተ፡ ድዮቅልጠያኖስ፤ ፶፻፰፻፶፫፡
msItem.explicit: ወአመ፡ ፰አመቱ፡ ለዮናታን፡ ንጉሠ፡ ይሁዳ፡ እስከ፡ ፭፻፡ ወ፴ወ፪፡ ዓመቱ፡ ለድዮቅልጥያኖስ፡ ዓመተ፡ ፲፻፡ ወ፭፻፡ ወ፺ወ፮፡ ወአመ፡ ፭፻፡ ወ፴ወ፫፡ ዓመተ፡ ድዮቅልጥያኖስ፡ እስከ፡ ፲፻፡ ወ፷ወ፭፡ ዓመቱ፡ ለድዮቅልጥያኖስ፡ ዓመተ፤ ፭፻፡ ወ፴፬፡ ወኮነ፡ ኵሉ፡ ድሙሩ፡ ዘእምቀዳማይ፡ ዓመቱ፡ ለአዳም፡ እስከ፡ ፲፻፡ ወ፷ወ፮፡ ለድዮቅልጥያኖስ፡ ይከውን፡ ፷፻፡ ወ፱፻፡ ፲ወ፮፨
msItem.note: Computation of the cycles of years according to several calendars (i.e., the Greek and Enoch systems) and chronological calculations.

msItem.title: Maṣḥafa ḥassāb
msItem.incipit:
መጽሐፍ፡ ሐሰብ። ቀዳሜሁ፡ ውእቱ፡ ቃል፡ ወውእቱ፡ ቃል፡ እምኀበ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ወእግዚአብሔር፡ ውእቱ፡ ቃል፡
በቀደሚ፡ ገብረ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ሰማየ፡ ወምድርሰ፡ ሀለወት፡ እምትካት፡ ወኢተስተርኢ፡ ወኢከነት፡ ድሉት፡ ወጽልመት፡ መልዕልተ፡
ቃላይ፡
msItem.explicit:
ወለእመ፡ ፈቀድከ፡ ታአምር፡ በእንተ፡ ዘያአቱ፡ ፪፡ ዕለተ፡ ለረኪቦተ፡ ዕለተ፡ ዮሓንስ፡ እስመ፡ ቀዳሚሁ፡ ለዓመት፡
ዲዮቅልጥያኖስ፡ ዐርብ፡ መለረኪበ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ያአቱ፡ ፪፡ ዓርብ፡ ወሰንበተ፡ አይሁድ፡ ወይብልዋ፡ ኪያሃ፡ አሐቲ፡ አለት፡ ቅድመ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፨
msItem.note: The text is preceded by a number of tables for determination of the year of indiction, the number of the epagomenal days, the epact and the ṭǝntyon since the origin of the world.
Tables for determination of the moveable feasts.
Calendar of saints, arranged according to their feast day.
msItem.incipit:
በስመ፡ አብ፡ ወወልደ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ በዘ፡ ንጽሕፍ፡ አርእስት፡ በዓላት፡ በወርሐ፡ መስከረም። ፩ዮሐንስ፡ መጥምቅ፡
ወበርተሎሚወስ፡ ሐዋርያ፡ ወራጎኤል፡ ሊቀ፡ መላእክት፡ ወኢዮብ፡ ጸድቅ፨
ውስተ፡ ኵሉ፡ ምድር፡ ወጽአ፡ ነገሮሙ፨
msItem.explicit: ኣመ፡ ፬፡ በአማን። አመ፡ ፭፡ አበ፡ መግደር፡ ኪየከ፡ ተወከሉ፡ አበዊነ፨

msItem.title: Qǝddāse Yoḥannǝs ʾAfa Warq za-qʷǝrbān (Anaphora of John Chrysostom on the offering)
msItem.note:
The text follows the text edited in:
51-56 up to , then few passages are added.
msItem.explicit: በላዓክሙ፡ ጸገብክሙ፡ ሰተይክሙ፡ ረወይክሙ፡ በሰላም፡ እትው፡ ውስተ፡ አብያቲክሙ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ የሀሎ፡ መስሌክሙ፨

msItem.note: Hymn to Our Lady Mary with a commemoration of the Apostles.
msItem.incipit: ተዘኪረኪ፡ ማርያም፡ ስቅለተ፡ ጴጥሮስ፡ አምደ፡ ሮሜ፡ ኰኵሕ፡ ብሂል፡ ዘበትርጓሜሁ፡
msItem.explicit: ፰ተዘኪረኪ፡ ማርያም፡ ዘአስጠምዎ፡ ውስተ፡ ባሕር፡ ለበርተሎሜዎስ፡ ምምሕር፡

collation.signatures: Quires are numbered with Arabic numerals on the lower outer margin of the first folio of each quire. Most of them are abraded.

handNote.seg: Nomina sacra, titles, liturgical admonishments; elements of the text dividers; Ethiopic numerals.

item.q: اذكر يا رب عبدك الخاطي المسكين قسيس غبريال المصري قاصد البطرك الاسكندراني وراهب دير العذرى مريم جبل الطير واذكر يا رب كاللذين يذكرنا من الابهات الحبش

Remember, o my Lord, your servant, the poor sinner priest Ġabriyāl the Egyptian, delegate of the Alexandrine patriarch and monk of the Monastery of the Virgin Mary of Ǧabal al-Ṭayr; and remember, o Lord, those who will commemorate us amongst the Ethiopian fathers
item.note: The note is written in Arabic on the front board on its inner side. It was drawn up by the Egyptian priest Ġabriyāl.

item.q: ወተፈጸመ፡ ዝንቱ፡ ሴኖዶስ፡ በዋርኀ፡ ግንቦት፡ ፰፡ በሰርቀ፡ መልአት፡ ፫፡ በሰርቀ፡ ሌሌት። በመዋዕለ፡ ወንጌላዊ፡ ማቴዎስ፡ ፮፼፡ ወ፭፻፡ ፹ወ፭፡ ዓመተ፡ አደም።
item.note: The note is written in red ink and states that the Sinodos was completed on the 8th of Gǝnbot in the year of Adam 6585, year of Matthew. The date can not be assessed with certainty: it might correspond to 1593 AD or be incorrect.
Historical note on the monastic community of .

item.q: ፷፼ወ፮፻፲ወ፮ዓምት። ሰረቀ፡ መስከረም፡ እሁድ፡ ሰረቀ፡ ጥቅምት፡ ሰሉስ። ኅዳር፡ ሐሙስ፡ ትሕሳስ፡ ቀደሚ፡ ሰንበት። ጥር፡ ሰኑይ። የካቲት፡ ረቡዕ። መጋቢተ፡ ዓርብ። ሚያዚያ፡ እሁድ። ግንቦት፡ ሰሉስ። ሰኔ፡ ሐሙስ። ሐምሌ፡ ቀዳሚ፡ ሰንበት፡ ነሐሴ፡ ሰነይ። ጳጉሜን፡ ረቡዕ፡ በዘመነ፡ ዮሐንስ።
item.note: The note refers to the year 6616, year of John. The date can not be assessed with certainty; it might correspond to 1624 AD or be incorrect.

item.q: እምኀበ፡ ለአከ፡ ... ማⶂⶂሮአም፡ (?) ዘሮማ፡ ትብጸሕ፡ ኢየሩሰሌም፡
item.note: The note is hardly legible because of the faded ink. It mentions and .

item.q: Missale; n° 1. Aduerte Lector hunc Codicem esse Vitiosissime scriptum ejusque autoritatem exigui valoris.
Missal; nr. 1. Be careful o reader, that this codex is very defective and its reliability is of low value.
item.note: Note written by a later librarian and by concerning the reliability of the manuscript. The note was probably written in 1665.
Note written by a later librarian.
Two lines containing the incipit of Letter of Eusebius to Carpianus, as in lines 3 እንዘ፡ - 7 እመትሎሆሙ፡.
Note written on the upper margin by probably in 1665.
Note written on the upper margin by probably in 1665.
Note written on the upper margin by probably in 1665.
Note written on the upper margin by probably in 1665.

item.q: Nota bene Maximum hic esse errore. confundit et miscet enim hic duo Concilia. Stulte idem error et jam est in Codice Magni Ducis Florentiae. Sed Codex Abissinorum et meus bene habent omn)a notauit autem Frater Giovanni Michahel Vanslebius Ord. Praed.

"Nota bene: a serious error is here, as (the scribe) confuses and blends here two councils. The same error is also trivially attested in the manuscript of the Grand Duke of Florence (i.e, ). However, the manuscript of the Ethiopians (i.e., of San Stefano dei Mori, (i.e, ) and mine display everything correctly. Brother Johann Michael Wansleben annotated (this)".
item.note: Note written in the intercolum by probably in 1665.
Note written on the outer upper margin by probably in 1665.
Note written on the outer upper margin by probably in 1665.
Note written on the outer margin by probably in 1665.
Note written on the outer margin by probably in 1665.
Note written on the outer margin by probably in 1665.
Note written on the outer margin by probably in 1665.
Note written on the outer margin by probably in 1665.

item.q: Aduerte Lector huc referri debere illos Canones quos scriptor supra ad concilium Gangerense annexuit.
Be careful o reader, that here you have to refer to those canons that the scribe previously appended to the council of Gangra.
item.note: Note written by probably in 1665.

item.q: Salve Regina... ladi zet chgrafi uin nero agua materi guortelo eledo uiniga po pais do uai
item.note: The note is written on the back board on its inner side, probably in a Vulgar language. The meaning is poorly understandable.

binding.decoNote: Two boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather.
Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover.

origin.p:
An origin from has been conjectured, together with Ms , cp.
12
215-216 . The Ms. had been preserved in (cp. ) before being incorporated into the .
